Html:
Hi,

Great work on this project.

Are there any plans to create / convert this project for Windows 8 / WinRT / XAML / C#?

I am more interested in the Flight status / tracking information, less in the graphical display.

Thanks,
Eitan
Could you please elaborate on your requirements. It is not completely clear to me what you mean by status / tracking. Sounds very much like Vataware or VATSpy to me.
